author: mariohavel
content:
<@&857649635274915900> Welcome the first week of EPF cohort 5! Today marks the start of our 5 month program, get ready for the kick off! 

Join us today at <t:1718031600:t> (3PM UTC) for the kick off call. We will share details about the program, provide guidelines and instructions for participation and answer your questions. It's also a chance to meet other fellows. Please make sure to attend as it includes necessary information for participants but there will be also recording afterwards. 
 The link to join is: 
https://meet.ethquokkaops.io/epf-standup

content: Super excited to join EPF5. I am very interested in consensus research and FHE technology. Want to learn and collaborate and connect. Thanks <@686695036733227017> and <@914307919699406908> for the opportunity. My name is George and from Singapore and will see you in EthCC.

author: philngo
content: Welcome everyone to EPF5! For any of the TypeScripters out there, we do have our information and ideas out there for Lodestar if you're looking for a TypeScript based consensus client for your hacking needs or to help us improve the client: https://github.com/eth-protocol-fellows/cohort-five/blob/main/projects/project-ideas.md. Our mentors <@534934855113506836> <@586161934425128960> and EPF3 grad <@1035747431461167125> are available here on discord for assistance!

author: kamuik16
content: I have one question, if I have merged a PR to an existing client, can I add that in my development updates?

author: mariohavel
content: If it's relevant to the current work or so. Otherwise it doesn't make much sense to add historical work to current progress updates
